mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBERFILE(FILENUM, ID, FILENAME, ORINAME) VALUES(FILE_SEQ.nextval, #{id}, #{fileName}, #{oriName})
mapper.select: SELECT id, M.name, M.phone, M.email, MF.fileNum, MF.fileName, MF.oriname FROM MEMBER M LEFT JOIN MEMBERFILE MF USING(id) WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER (id, pw, name, phone, email) VALUES(#{id}, #{pw}, #{name}, #{phone}, #{email})
